name: Hold Till Summer
description:
Hold Till Summer is a micro-strategy, tower defense game. Here, in summer  you have to harvest crops, hunt animals to earn gold and invest it to buy solders and archer to fight with monsters and dragons in winter. You can also borrow money from the bank when necessary. Earn gold, buy solders, fight unlimited waves of enemies..

Basic Controls

Use W/D to to move camera left or right. Use left mouse button to  interact with objects.

Farming: Buy seeds from shop. Drag  seeds to the farming spot with left mouse button, wait few sec. 

Hunting: Buy arrows from shop. Go to hunting area and click on Deer to hunt them. You can also kill monsters with arrow by clicking on them.

Solders and Archers: Buy Solders to kill ground monsters. Buy Archers to kill dragons which shows up after second winter..

Please Note: I have made this game in less than two days. It may be full of bugs and gliches  {Sorry  😢 } . Please let me know if you experienced any.

Thanks for Playing 😃..
